doc.title: Battle of San Juan Hill
doc.plot: "Soldiers are scouting through the thick underbrush. 'Forward by rushes,' comes the order, and up the hill they go, rushing, firing and throwing themselves behind each sheltering clump of bushes. Answering shots come from the block-house and the ranks wither. A struggle on the hill-top, and victory! Our flag is there to stay! Has created greatest enthusiasm."
